Wincci Z

Project Title

Vue Chat

Description

Vue Chat is a web application for group chat. It contains both client side and server side. The front-end part used Vue JS, while Node JS for the back-end side. The feature of communication from server to client is one of main factors in ensuring real-timeliness of client application.

This web application uses Socket.IO as client-server communication. Socket.IO is a JavaScript implementation to work with HTML 5 WebSockets.

This project began as a full stack development assignment to practice on JavaScript for both client side and server side. and also been optimized by my own UI design .

Technologies

Vue JS, Full Stack Development, Socket.IO

Role

Vue JS, Full Stack Development, Socket.IO

Year

2019
